Articles.Content:
Objective: Take off with a craft, and once in orbit around Kerbin, use a spaceplane to land on Ike, and return on the runway at the KSC.

Definition of a spaceplane:

-It touches land via landing gear, or rover tires.

-It is one stage.

-It uses a "cockpit" CM.

-It doesn't land on atmospheric bodies via a parachute .

-There has to be at least one control surface/canard for each of the three axis of rotation.

Rules:

-You ARE allowed to use any number of stages to get into orbit (one in orbit, all stages prior to, or after the spaceplane must be jettisoned).

-The spaceplane MUST comply with the aforesaid criteria.

-You HAVE to land on the real KSC runway, NOT the Easter egg one, and NOT the island one.

-You CANNOT use any mods.

Scoring: Your score is the percent of total liquid/xenon fuel remaining when you stop on the KSC runway. (15% remaining gives you a score of 15, not 0.15).

SCOREBOARD

1.

2.

3.

4.

5.

Proof of Possibility:

This craft gets a score of 11.

Dropbox link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/vhjntuylbcl5gt1/Shuttle.craft

Front:

Back:

NOTE: Mine has RCS, and the docking port, because it is my shuttle to and from my LKO station. This challenge came from when I decided to test the limit of this thing, and take it to Ike and back, and it worked!

Edited August 4, 2013 by Themohawkninja
I'll bump this once to see if anyone wants to give it a go.
Once my computer is fixed I'll try this challenge. Is Mechjeb allowed?

Once my computer is fixed I'll try this challenge. Is Mechjeb allowed?

No, I stated that no mods were allowed.

I think B9 has really nice parts for shuttles and you can`t even cheat with that. (not like with mechjeb autopilot) So I think you should allow the non cheat mods.

If I would have a shuttle mission to Ike, I would place a lander in the cargo bay and land with that (I mean land only with the lander). Than dock back in the shuttle`s cargo bay and go back to Kerbin. Pros: fuel efficient and reusable.

No point of landing the whole shuttle on a non-atmospherics planet/ moon. (unless you have something like a rover at the back or something)

And one more, you didn`t say that you can`t refuel with the shuttle at some point.

These are only my idea/suggestion/help about this type of missions. I hope that you can understand my point of view.

I just say no mods, because I don't feel like getting into debates about "is this mod cheaty?" since there are many mods that I don't know about.

Technically refueling at a later point counts as multiple stages (docking counts as stages).

Also, you can do EVA's on Ike if you want. No need to have a rover.
